RelatedSentence: All active , retired and honorably - discharged members of the United States Armed Forces will receive free admission to the park .
All military members will be required to have a valid ID , including active duty ID , retired personnel ID , VA ID or a copy of DD - 214 discharge papers and a photo ID .
Family members of military personnel will also receive a special discount on park admission .
They will be able to buy a regular ticket at $ 38.99 , which is $ 21 less than the normal admission cost .
Military members can also receive free admission into Soak City , which opens its gates May 24 .
